name: misc-utils-of-mine-generic
description: Miscellaneous utilities for JavaScript/TypeScript that I often use

scripts.test-js: npm run clean && npm run build && npx jest --testMatch "**/__tests__/**/*.js"
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test-js && npm run test
scripts.prepare: npm run build && npx shx rm -rf dist/**/__tests__
